title: Online photo viewed by millions of internet users in China
text:
Online photo viewed by millions of internet users in China 
CCTV.com Full coverage: President Xi Visits UK Selfie of Xi, Cameron and Sergio Aguero 
The Chinese President's visit to Manchester City has also helped one of the club's star players reach new heights in China, as Sergio Aguero's selfie with President Xi and British Prime Minister David Cameron has gone viral, becoming an instant hit online in China.The selfie was taken beside a Man City training ground. The Argentine star's post read "Thank you for the selfie, President Xi," according to the club's official website. 
Xi Jinping was accompied by Aguero and Toni Duggan of the Man City women's team, as he watched a training session of the club's first team squad. The Chinese President also received a club jersey with all of the first team players signatures on it. Related Videos
